Subject: Blanket Insurance

 

Hello Sara,

 

As it’s quarter closing, we will need to ensure all revenue recognition is done in a timely manner so we can have a smooth closing however it has come to my attention that the attached Blanket insurances for KWT and BHR will both expire on the 23rd of this month. Can you please therefore share the renewed copy.

 

Thank you,

Tala

Best regards,
Hagop
